name: Buddhist Tour Package
destination: Kathmandu - Lumbini - Kushinagar - Patna - Bodhgaya - Sarnath - Varanasi - Agra - Delhi

sketchProgram.title: ARRIVE KATHMANDU
sketchProgram.desc: On arrival meet and assist at the airport and transfer to pre-booked hotel.

sketchProgram.title: KATHMANDU
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast visit Kathmandu city, Swayambhunath & museum. Afternoon, excursion to Patan & Tibetan handicraft center.

sketchProgram.title: KATHMANDU
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast visit Boudhnath, Pashupatinath & Bhaktapur. Afternoon, excursion to Dhulikhel.

sketchProgram.title: KATHMANDU-BHAIRAWA (FLIGHT), BHAIRAWA-LUMBINI
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast, transfer to airport to board flight for Bhairawa. Arrive Bhairawa and transfer to Lumbini. In the afternoon, visit Lumbini

sketchProgram.title: LUMBINI-KUSHINAGAR
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast leave for Kushinagar. Arrive Kushinagar and transfer to hotel. Afternoon, visit Kushinagar

sketchProgram.title: KUSHINAGAR-PATNA
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast, leave for Patna. Enroute visit Vaishali. Arrive Patna and check in at pre-booked hotel.

sketchProgram.title: PATNA-BODHGAYA
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast, leave for Bodhgaya. Enroute visit Rajgir & Nalanda. Continue drive to Bodhgaya. Arrive Bodhgaya and check in at pre-booked hotel.

sketchProgram.title: BODHGAYA
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast, visit Bodhgaya. Afternoon, free for individual activities

sketchProgram.title: BODHGAYA-VARANASI
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast, leave for Varanasi. Arrive Varanasi and check in at pre-booked hotel. Afternoon, excursion to Sarnath - the place where Lord Buddha gave his first sermon.

sketchProgram.title: VARANASI-AGRA (OVERNIGHT TRAIN)
sketchProgram.desc: Early morning, leave for boat ride on the Ganges. Return to hotel for breakfast. After breakfast, city tour of Varanasi. In the evening transfer to the railway station to board train for Agra. Overnight in the train.

sketchProgram.title: ARRIVE AGRA
sketchProgram.desc: Arrive Agra in the morning and transfer to pre-booked hotel. Afternoon, visit the Taj Mahal, Red Fort & Itmad-ud-daulah.

sketchProgram.title: AGRA-DELHI
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast, leave for Delhi. Arrive Delhi & check in at pre-booked hotel. Rest of the day free for individual activities.

sketchProgram.title: DEPART DELHI
sketchProgram.desc: After breakfast, full day city tour of Old & New Delhi. Evening, transfer to the airport to board flight back home
